BinaryAnalysis::InstructionSemantics::NullSemantics::State

BinaryAnalysis::InstructionSemantics::NullSemantics::State< ValueType > Struct Template Reference

#include <NullSemantics.h>

Detailed Description

template<template< size_t > class ValueType = NullSemantics::ValueType>
struct BinaryAnalysis::InstructionSemantics::NullSemantics::State< ValueType >

Virtual machine state.

Policies generally maintain a "current state" upon which RISC operations operate. For instantce, the writeRegister() method modifies the current state. A state contains values whose types are defined by the policy.
